Hero.title: AI Prompt Management Tool
Hero.description: Easily manage and optimize your AI prompts

QuickStart.title: Start Creating
QuickStart.description: Begin your journey with Smart Prompt and create your first AI prompt

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.description: Frequently Asked Questions about Smart Prompt

q1.question: What is Smart Prompt?
q1.answer: Smart Prompt is a professional AI prompt management and optimization tool.

q2.question: How to get started?
q2.answer: Click the 'Get Started' button to start collecting and managing prompts.

q3.question: Is it free to use?
q3.answer: Yes, basic features are completely free.

q4.question: How does prompt optimization work?
q4.answer: Our AI analyzes your prompts and provides optimization suggestions based on best practices.

Plugins.title: Browser Plugin
Plugins.description: Use our browser plugin to manage your prompts anywhere

quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: Access your saved prompts with one click

contextMenu.title: Context Menu
contextMenu.description: Save prompts quickly via right-click menu on any page

sync.title: Auto Sync
sync.description: Automatically sync all prompts with your account
